name: Colourful County
description:
More Games by Retrowill

Made for LoJam 2022; Theme: "Back Together"

A quick puzzle game driving cars around the dirt roads of Colourful County!

How to play

Get a car of the corresponding colour into each dotted box. Drive over paint spills to change the colour of your car!

Move: WASD/Arrows | Switch Car: Enter/Space | Undo: Z | Restart: R | Menu: M

Acknowledgments

Thank you Em for playtesting and saying "vroom"!

Engine and Art: GameMaker | Music: Beepbox | Sound: Bfxr & Audacity
